comment._content: Johanna Gadski (1872-1932), opera singer, Wagnerian soprano, "considered one of the most celebrated Brunhildes of the early 20th century"; wife of Captain Hans Tauscher, mother of Mrs. Charlotte Busch: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Johanna_Gadski
